passages.text:
Welcome to Ensomme! What brings you to our island?
[[I'm looking for work.|Work]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text: Ah, but before you go, you'll need some things in order to provide fish for the festival. Here's a festival badge and a pamphlet about the rules, just in case. I'll just collect the fishing permit fee now. [[Festival 4.1]]
passages.name: Festival 4

passages.text:
Take the badge to Anthony by the blue flag in the town square. He'll get you set up with some basic fishing gear. May the tides flow in your favor!
[[Festival 5]]
passages.name: Festival 4.1

passages.text:
Ah... Well, I hope you are not disappointed to discover that any work you might find here will not be flashy. This is a fishing community, and most of our livelihood comes from the sea. I hope this will suit you.
[[That's fine, I just need to make some money.|Make some money]]

links.name: That's fine, I just need to make some money.|Make some money
links.link: That's fine, I just need to make some money.|Make some money

passages.name: Work

passages.text:
Well, you are in luck: we will be celebrating the sea's bountiful gifts in a few day's time with a festival and a feast. The town will be in need of as many fish as the sea can give us. And in return, we will offer our thanks and our devotion. It's quite a treat to behold.
[[I'll probably be gone by then.|Gone by then]]

links.name: I'll probably be gone by then.|Gone by then
links.link: I'll probably be gone by then.|Gone by then

passages.name: Make some money

passages.text:
Oh, I'm terribly sorry, but I'm afraid that won't be possible. You see, the boat's engines disrupt our wildlife, and so transportation to and from the island is forbidden in the final days leading up to the festival.
[[I see...|I see]]
passages.name: Gone by then

passages.text:
Don't worry, you will be perfectly comfortable here for the next few days. If you need anything, I'm Mayor Olsen. Find me and I will offer you guidance and assistance if I'm able.
[[Festival 4]]
passages.name: I see
